short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that enables pip when you click it. does not register a background service worker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a shortcut to enable Picture in Picture mode (PiP) for the currently playing video on your tab. This extension has no tracking analytics (unlike googles official pip extension), and doesn't run any background processes if you don't click on it
